tool_description: An API that collects news from various regions around the world from the BBC news website. It provides access to the latest news articles, summaries, URLs, images, timestamps, and sources for news items covering a wide range of topics such as climate, wars, coronavirus, business, technology, science, health, and more. The API fetches news data from the BBC website and provides a convenient way to access and retrieve up-to-date news information from different regions globally
name: BBC World News API
title: BBC World News API

api_list.name: Get News by Sport
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve news articles for a specific sport. It returns a list of news articles related to the specified sport.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bbc-world-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/sport/cricket"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bbc-world-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bbc-world-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Sports News
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve news articles related to sports. It returns a list of news articles covering various sports and sporting events.

api_list.name: Get All News
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve news articles from various topics. It returns a list of news articles covering a wide range of subjects such as climate, world events, technology, health, and more.

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get news on specific topic
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves news based on a specific news ID. Users can provide a news ID corresponding to a category or region of interest, and the API will return news items related to that ID. For example, /news/climate will fetch news articles specifically related to climate.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bbc-world-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/tech"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bbc-world-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bbc-world-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All news from world wide
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches news articles from all categories and regions worldwide. It returns a comprehensive collection of news items, including titles, summaries, URLs, images, timestamps, and sources.
api_list.code:

url = "https://bbc-world-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bbc-world-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
